thread.title: Ex world darts champ banned for cocaine use
thread.title_full: Ex world darts champ banned for cocaine use

title: Ex world darts champ banned for cocaine use
text:
Former world darts champion Richie Burnett tests positive for cocaine, banned for 18 months THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   7:54   7:54   
Subjects: 

LONDON — A former world darts champion has been banned for 18 months after testing positive for cocaine. 
UK Anti-Doping says Richie Burnett, a Welshman who won the world championship in 1995, tested positive in an in-competition test in November 2014. 
Burnett is suspended until May 2, 2016. 
UKAD legal director Graham Arthur says in a statement on Wednesday that "no matter what the circumstances, (athletes) are solely responsible for any prohibited substance found in their system."
